system.effect: A Mysterious Eldar Device, creating phantom copies of the ship. Ships firing at this one have -20 to BS Tests, or -30 if a lance weapon. Piloting Tests to Perform Hit and Run attacks have -30. Must choose to use either this or Void Shields at start of combat.
